entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: E 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
